name: Stellar Predator
description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Fischl, equip this card.
After Fischl equips this card, immediately use Nightrider once.
When your Fischl, who has this card equipped, creates an Oz, and after Fischl uses a Normal Attack: Deal 2 Electro DMG. (Consumes Usage(s))
(You must have Fischl in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionraw:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1401]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A1401] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S14012]</color> once.
When your $[A1401], who has this card equipped, creates an <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C114011]</color>, and after $[A1401] uses a <color=#FFFFFFFF>Normal Attack</color>: Deal 2 $[K104]. (Consumes $[K3])
(You must have $[A1401] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionreplaced:
<color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>Fischl</color>, equip this card.
After Fischl equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>Nightrider</color> once.
When your Fischl, who has this card equipped, creates an <color=#FFFFFFFF>Oz</color>, and after Fischl uses a <color=#FFFFFFFF>Normal Attack</color>: Deal 2 {SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color>. (Consumes <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>)
(You must have Fischl in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
storytext: "The instant in which Ozvaldo Hrafnavins shows his great might."
source: Reward for inviting Fischl to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives
